Class ListGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mccc.cos210.ds.ListGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NFA

    public class ListGraph
extends Object
implements Graph
    A ListGraph is a class that uses an array of lists to represent the edges
